name: Backwards Linking Tool
subtitle: Same as the Linking Tool, Connects things Sender To Receiver.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Crafted from an interaction of the $(l:pedestals:tools/linkingtool)Linking Tool$()

pages.title: 使用
pages.text: $(li)Used to craft $(l)Pedestals$(). $(li)Used to craft the $(l:pedestals:upgrades/type_misc/default)Base Upgrade$() crafting component item.

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Right Click$() Tool on pedestal to see details about it. $(li) $(l)Crouch Right Click$() a pedestal to select it. $(li) $(l)Crouch Right Click$() a non-pedestal block to clear the currently selected pedestal. $(li)$(l)Crouch Right Click$() in the air to swap to the $(l:pedestals:tools/linkingtool)Linking Tool$().

pages.title: Interactions Cont.
pages.text: $(li)When the tool has a selection, when in the $(l)OFFHAND$() and placing pedestals, the placed pedestals will automatically be linked as $(l)RECEIVERS$().

pages.title: Linking Process
pages.text: This Tool Connects Pedestals Sender to Receiver. $(li)First Select the Pedestal $(l)SENDING$() $(li)Second Select the Pedestal $(l)RECEIVING$()

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: When a Pedestal is Selected by the tool, some in-world details will also show for that selection. $(li)A red box will appear, this is the linking range when $(l)SENDING$(). $(li)White Boxes will display on all $(l)RECEIVER$() pedestals connected to the selected one.

pages.title: Notes Cont.
pages.text: $(li)Different shades of smoke particles will show on these linked pedestals, this shows priority linked order from darkest to lightest (1st - 8th)
